CustomField.formula:
IF( AND( N26_Promotion__r.Cost_per_Calendar_Month_Discount__c >0, Promotion_Start_Date__c <= TODAY() , Promotion_End_Date__c >= TODAY()),
ROUND(N26_Product__r.Cost_per_Calendar_Month__c-N26_Product__r.Cost_per_Calendar_Month__c*N26_Promotion__r.Cost_per_Calendar_Month_Discount__c ,2),
N26_Product__r.Cost_per_Calendar_Month__c)
CustomField.label: Cost per Calendar Month
